articles.title: Victory hunt third coach this season as Salvachua sets sail - SBS - The World Game
articles.description: Melbourne Victory are on the hunt for their third coach this A-League season after Carlos Salvachua confirmed his immediate departure on Saturday.
articles.content:
The Spaniard served as Kevin Muscat's assistant last season before taking control on an interim basis in January when Marco Kurz was sacked after just 13 games in charge.

articles.title: $24M loss brings iconic F1 family empire to its knees - Fox Sports
articles.description: Williams has announced it is considering selling the Formula 1 team after a dip in the company’s financial results.
articles.content:
The Williams Grand Prix Holdings group reported an adjusted loss of £13m (A$23.9m) for the year ending 2019, against profits of £12.9m in 2018, and new investment will now be sought.
